bug.short_desc: “zanata pull” downloads *all* .po files, even those which have no translations at all, “zanata-cli pull” downloads only those which have translations.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
mfabian@ari:/local/mfabian/src/ibus-typing-booster/po (master *$%) $ zanata-cli pull zanata-cli pull [INFO] Loading project config from zanata.xml [INFO] Loading user config from /home/mfabian/.config/zanata.ini [INFO] client API version: 3.9.1, server API version: 3.9.1 [INFO] Server: https://fedora.zanata.org/ [INFO] Project: ibus-typing-booster [INFO] Version: master [INFO] Username: mfabian [INFO] Project type: gettext [INFO] Enable modules: false [INFO] Using ETag cache: true [INFO] Purging ETag cache beforehand: false [INFO] Locales to pull: [sq, ar, as, ast, bal, eu, bn, bn-IN, brx, bs, br, bg, ca, zh-CN, zh-HK, zh-TW, kw, kw-GB, cs, da, nl, en-GB, eo, et, fi, fr, gl, ka, de, el, gu, he, hi, hu, is, id, ia, it, ja, kn, kk, km, ky, ko, lt, nds, mk, mai, ms, ml, mr, mn, ne, nb, nn, or, pa, fa, pl, pt, pt-BR, ro, ru, sr, sr@latin, si, sk, sl, es, sv, tg, ta, te, bo, tr, uk, ur, wba, cy, lv, kw@uccor, kw@kkcor, af, am, be, hr, de-CH, th, vi, zu, ilo, nso, tw, yo, anp, ga, my] [INFO] Encode tab as \t: true [INFO] Current directory: /local/mfabian/src/ibus-typing-booster/po [INFO] Pulling target documents (translations) only [INFO] Target-language base directory (translations): . document ibus-typing-booster [INFO] No translations found in locale my for document ibus-typing-booster mfabian@ari:/local/mfabian/src/ibus-typing-booster/po (master *$%) $
I.e. with “zanata-cli pull” I get:
[INFO] No changes in translations for locale fr and document ibus-typing-booster
for files where translations exist and
[INFO] No translations found in locale my for document ibus-typing-booster
where they don’t. The files where no translations exist are not downloaded.
But with “zanata pull” I get:
]

zanata-python-client-1.5.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-adb89b2076
zanata-python-client-1.5.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
